formalpara.title: Figure 12. Mitotic spindle oscillations.
formalpara.para: (a) Oscillations of the first mitotic spindle in the fertilized egg of C. elegans. (b-d) Cortical rotation and spindle oscillations in R. anomala. The future embryonic posterior pole is on the left in (a), on the right in (b-d). Reproduced from Nigon et al., (1960).
